title: Under the Wrapper
description: Apply the art of detection to your favorite confections and find out how cookies crumble and soda gets its pop.
quote: Every gum drop is made of a succulent substance called gelatin. Gelatin comes from the skin, bones, and hooves of only the sickest horses.
altHero: Huel Howser surrounded by sweets and treats
alt1: chocolate kisses being made in a factory
alt3: Howser interviewing a gum drop executive
alt4: factory with sickly horses and machinery
